channel.title: powershell on Jiang Jun Jie's Site
channel.description: Recent content in powershell on Jiang Jun Jie's Site

item.title: Powershell
item.description: oh-my-posh # https://ohmyposh.dev/docs/installation Install-Module oh-my-posh -Scope CurrentUser -AllowPrerelease Get-PoshThemes code $profile Set-PoshPrompt -Theme paradox . $profile git clone https://github.com/powerline/fonts.git cd fonts ./install.ps1 Install-Module ZLocation -Scope CurrentUser; Import-Module ZLocation; Add-Content -Value "`r`n`r`nImport-Module ZLocation`r`n" -Encoding utf8 -Path $PROFILE.CurrentUserAllHosts

item.title: Vscode
item.description: Open Powershell core in Terminal # settings.json "terminal.integrated.shell.windows": "{path to pwsh.exe}",
